oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1957-07-20 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from July 20, 1957. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Ernest Tubb (host/performer), guest performers the Wilburn Brothers, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, June Carter, and Del Wood. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 928th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: June Carter; Wilburn Brothers; Del Wood; Ernest Tubb
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Ernest Tubb introduces June Carter -- Comedy routine (June Carter, Ernest Tubb) -- Prince Albert commercial (Ernest Tubb, Grant Turner) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Ernest Tubb introduces the Wilburn Brothers -- Go Away With Me (Wilburn Brothers) -- Ernest Tubb introduces Del Wood -- Chinese Breakdown (Del Wood) -- Ernest Tubb talks -- Driftwood On The River (Ernest Tubb) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Ernest Tubb) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial -- Station announcements -- Noel Hotel commercial (Grant Turner)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Brasfield, Rod; Atkins, Chet; Wood, Del; Cash, June Carter, 1929-2003; Jackson, Tommy; Tubb, Ernest, 1914-1984; Byrd, Billy; Wilburn Brothers; Wilburn, Teddy; Wilburn, Doyle
